mapper.select: select * from report WHERE s_id=#{s_id} ORDER BY r_idx DESC
mapper.insert: insert into report (r_idx, s_id, r_id, kind, reason) values (seq_report.nextval, #{s_id}, #{r_id}, #{kind}, #{reason})
mapper.update: UPDATE report SET kind=#{param1}, reason=#{param2} WHERE r_id=#{param3} AND r_idx=#{param4}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM report WHERE s_id=#{param1} AND r_idx=#{param2}
